    ChemJokes App

    Project 2 of the mega update: ChemJokes - GitHub

    I am taking chemistry this year and after hearing a million and a half chemistry jokes, I decided to make an app. The app sends you a daily chemistry joke. The jokes all come from a simple Rails API I created.

    What I learned:

    • Timers
    • Notifications
    • Layout Practice
